title: Road/designationexisting amenity/reservation)shall be handed over to MCGM free of cost
clause_text: Road/designationexisting amenity/reservation)shall be handed over to MCGM free of cost.The FSI of the plot handed over to MCGM shall be allowed to be utilized on the remaining plot.
